definition: Tuva, a republic in south-central Siberia, Russia
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]
Tuvalu

sentences.english: So the Daurs are also talented musicians.
sentences.chinese: 所以说图瓦人也是音乐高手。

sentences.english: Tyva is widely regarded as medicinal storage area of Russia.
sentences.chinese: 图瓦被广泛认为是俄罗斯药的存放区。

sentences.english: Daur is the language spoken by the Daur ethnic people, which we're going to visit today.
sentences.chinese: 这图语就是我们今天要拜访的图瓦族的语言。

sentences.english: In fact, the most salient Daur ethnic features are shown by those little wooden houses scattered in the village.
sentences.chinese: 其实最有图瓦族特色的是那些散落在村中的小木屋。

sentences.english: Tuvalu is one of the places on earth that is most vulnerable to the affects of global warming.
sentences.chinese: 图瓦卢是全球受到气候变暖影响最为严重的地方之一。

sentences.english: No data are available for Tuvalu.
sentences.chinese: 没有图瓦卢的森林覆盖数据。
